## Code example: Python (syntax highlighted)

```python
from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Student:
    name: str
    grade: float

def top_students(students, threshold=90.0):
    return [s for s in students if s.grade >= threshold]

group = [Student("Ann", 91), Student("Bob", 88), Student("Cara", 95)]
print(top_students(group))

```
